title: The Project Proponent/s shall apply to the State Government for obtaining permission and declaration of such project to be a ―Integrated Township Project‖
clause_text: The Project Proponent/s shall apply to the State Government for obtaining permission and declaration of such project to be a ―Integrated Township Project‖. Such application shall be accompanied by the following attested documents in two sets :-
section: Permission and Declaration of Project by State Government :-
